elements.title: Farnese Artemis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that while the objects on the Farnese Artemis (pictured) had initially been identified as female breasts, the museum housing the statue now describes them as bull scrotums?

elements.title: the history (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in the history of fisheries in the Philippines, the once-dominant local municipal fisheries were supplanted first by commercial fisheries, and then by aquaculture?

elements.title: Eliza Legzdina (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Eliza Legzdina has attributed opinions of her work to the "horrification of the female body"?

elements.title: center squeeze (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the center squeeze has been blamed for costing Gary Johnson the 2016 US presidential election?

elements.title: Atsuko Tanaka (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that voice actress Atsuko Tanaka often named pandas?

elements.title: a Texas TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that seven people died when their helicopter struck supporting wires of a Texas TV station's tower and crashed?

elements.title: Michael P. Walsh (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Michael P. Walsh oversaw the construction of 15 buildings as the president of Boston College?

elements.title: Over My Dead Body (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jer Lau, who appeared in the film Over My Dead Body, also performed its theme song because the director felt his role was too minor?

elements.title: Booby Island (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the search for mammals on Booby Island was a bust?
